hero.title: Nika Amandla Umfelandawonye Wakho
hero.subtitle: Hlola Izinhloso Zokusimama
hero.description: Lula, ivikelekile, futhi ine-impact Yenza umfelandawonye wakho uchume esikhathini sedijithali ngenkathi wakha izindlela zokusimama zesikhathi esizayo.

items.title: Ukuhlola Okusimeme
items.description: Hlola izindlela zemvelo, zezenhlalo, kanye nezokuphatha ukuze wakhe umfelandawonye osimeme kanye nonomthwalo.

items.title: Izinhlelo Zokusebenza
items.description: Landela inqubekelaphambili yakho ngamabhodi e-Kanban asebenzisanayo, uguqule imibono yokuhlola ibe yimisebenzi engasebenza kanye nentuthuko elinganiswayo.

items.title: Yenzelwe Amafelandawonye
items.description: Yenzelwe ngokukhethekile izinhlangano zamafelandawonye eNingizimu Afrika

items.title: Ukusekela Izilimi Eziningi
items.description: Itholakala ngesiNgisi, isiSwati, isiPutukezi, isiZulu, isiJalimani, kanye nesiFulentshi

items.title: Ikhono Lokusebenza Ungaxhunyiwe ku-inthanethi
items.description: Isebenza ngokuthembekile noma ngabe kukhona ukuxhumana okulinganiselwe kwe-inthanethi

userGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womsebenzisi WamaFelandawonye
userGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandlela ophelele wokusebenzisa ipulatifomu yokuhlola ukusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Ukuqala Okusheshayo
quickStart.step1: 1. 📋 Qala noma uphendule ukuhlola kusuka kudeshibhodi yakho
quickStart.step3: 3. 📎 Namathisela amadokhumenti okusekela lapho kufanele khona
quickStart.step5: 5. 📊 Sebenzisa imiphumela ukuze udale izinhlelo zokusebenza futhi ulandele inqubekelaphambili

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
content: Siyakwamukela ePulatifomu Yokuhlola Ukusimama ye-DGRV! Leli thuluzi lisiza umfelandawonye wakho ukuthi ulinganise futhi uthuthukise izindlela zawo zokusimama.
Ideshibhodi yakho inikeza ukufinyelela kokuhlola, izinhlelo zokusebenza, kanye namathuluzi okulandela inqubekelaphambili.
Uma ungumlawuli wenhlangano, ungadala ukuhlola okusha futhi uphathe amalungu eqembu. Abasebenzisi benhlangano bangaphendula ukuhlola futhi balandele inqubekelaphambili.

roles.title: Ukuqonda Izindima Zabasebenzisi
content: Umlawuli Wenhlangano (org_admin): Angadala ukuhlola okusha, aphathe abasebenzisi, futhi abuke yonke idatha yenhlangano.
Umsebenzisi Wenhlangano (Org_User): Angaphendula ukuhlola okunikeziwe, abuke imiphumela, futhi aphathe izinhlelo zokusebenza.
Zombili izindima zingafinyelela ideshibhodi, zibuke okuthunyelwe, futhi zithumele imibiko yenhlangano yazo.

assessments.title: Ukuthatha Ukuhlola
content: Ukuhlola kuhlelwe ngezigaba (isib., Imvelo, Ezenhlalo, Ukuphatha) ngemibuzo esigabeni ngasinye.
Kumbuzo ngamunye, nikeza: Impendulo Yebo/Cha, iphesenti lokuqeda (0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%), kanye nencazelo yombhalo enemininingwane.
Unganamathisela amafayela ukusekela izimpendulo zakho (ubukhulu be-1MB ngefayela ngalinye). Sebenzisa uphawu lwekliphu lephepha ukuze ufake amadokhumenti.
Gcina inqubekelaphambili yakho noma nini ngokusebenzisa 'Gcina Okusalungiswa'. Qeda yonke imibuzo esigabeni ngaphambi kokuya kwesinye.
Uma kuthunyelwe, ukuhlola kuya enqubweni yokubuyekezwa ngaphambi kokuvunywa kokugcina.

actionPlans.title: Ukuphatha Izinhlelo Zokusebenza
content: Izinhlelo zokusebenza zikusiza ukulandela imisebenzi yokuthuthukisa esekelwe ezincomweni zokuhlola.
Sebenzisa ibhodi le-Kanban ukuze uhambise imisebenzi ngezigaba: Okufanele Kwenziwe → Kuyaqhubeka → Kwenziwe → Kuvunyiwe.
Faka imisebenzi emisha, setha izinsuku zokugcina, futhi unikeze amalungu eqembu ukuze ulandele inqubekelaphambili ngokuphumelelayo.
Ukubuyekezwa okujwayelekile kwezinhlelo zakho zokusebenza kukhombisa imizamo eqhubekayo yokuthuthukisa.
Thumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukuze wabelane ngenqubekelaphambili nabathintekayo kanye nabaphathi.

viewingResults.title: Ukubuka Imiphumela Yokuhlola
content: Finyelela konke okuthunyelwe kwakho nge-'Buka Ukuhlola' kudeshibhodi.
Landela isimo sokuthunyelwe: Kusalindwe Ukubuyekezwa → Ngaphansi Kokubuyekezwa → Kuvunyiwe/Kunqatshiwe/Kuceliwe Ukubuyekezwa.
Buka impendulo enemininingwane kanye nezincomo ezivela kubabuyekezi ukuze uqonde izindawo zokuthuthukisa.
Qhathanisa imiphumela ezikhathini ezahlukene zokuhlola ukuze ulandele inqubekelaphambili yomfelandawonye wakho.
Sebenzisa ukubuka okuthunyelwe ukuze ubuyekeze izimpendulo zakho kanye namadokhumenti okusekela.

creatingAssessments.title: Ukudala Ukuhlola (Abalawuli Kuphela)
content: Abalawuli benhlangano bangaqala imijikelezo emisha yokuhlola yomfelandawonye wabo.
Chofoza 'Qala Ukuhlola Okusimeme' ukuze udale ukuhlola okusalungiswa.
Yabelana nge-ID yokuhlola namalungu eqembu ukuze bangafaka isandla ezigabeni ezahlukene.
Qaphela inqubekelaphambili futhi uqinisekise ukuthi zonke izigaba ziqediwe ngaphambi kokuthumela kokugcina.
Thumela ukuhlola kuphela uma zonke izigaba ezidingekayo ziqedwe ngokuphelele.

userManagement.title: Ukuphatha Amalungu Eqembu (Abalawuli Kuphela)
content: Abalawuli benhlangano bangafaka futhi baphathe amalungu eqembu nge-'Phatha Abasebenzisi'.
Mema abasebenzisi abasha nge-imeyili futhi unikeze izindima ezifanele ngokuya ngezibopho zabo.
Nika ukufinyelela kwesigaba kubasebenzisi ukuze bangafaka isandla ezindaweni ezithile zokuhlola.
Susa abasebenzisi abangasadingeki ukufinyelela ukuze ugcine ukuphepha kanye nobuqotho bedatha.
Buyekeza izimvume zabasebenzisi njalo ukuze uqinisekise amazinga okufinyelela afanele.

reportsExports.title: Imibiko kanye Nezithumela
content: Thumela imibiko yokuhlola ngefomethi ye-PDF ukuze yabelwe nabathintekayo kanye namabhodi.
Sebenzisa izithumela ze-CSV zokuhlaziya idatha kanye nokulandela izitayela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
Landa amadokhumenti e-Word ukuze uthole imibhalo enemininingwane kanye nezinjongo zokubika.
Ukukhiqiza imibiko njalo kusiza ukukhombisa imizamo eqhubekayo yokuthuthukisa.
Yabelana ngemibiko namalungu kanye nabathintekayo ukuze ugcine ukuba sobala.

bestPractices.title: Izindlela Ezinhle ZamaFelandawonye
content: Bandakanya amalungu eqembu ahlukahlukene ekwenzeni ukuhlola ukuze uthole imibono ebanzi ngezindlela zokusimama.
Nikeza izimpendulo ezinemininingwane, ezethembekile ezinezibonelo ezithile kanye namadokhumenti okusekela.
Sebenzisa imiphumela yokuhlola ukuze udale izinhlelo zokusebenza ezingafezeka, ezingafinyeleleka zokuthuthukisa.
Imijikelezo yokuhlola ejwayelekile (minyaka yonke noma kabini ngonyaka) isiza ukulandela inqubekelaphambili kanye nokugcina umfutho.
Gubha ukuthuthukisa futhi wabelane ngempumelelo namalungu omfelandawonye kanye nomphakathi.

troubleshooting.title: Izinkinga Ezijwayelekile kanye Nezixazululo
content: Awukwazi ukufinyelela ukuhlola: Hlola nomlawuli wenhlangano yakho mayelana nokunikezwa kwezindima kanye nokufinyelela kwesigaba.
Ukuhlola akugcinwa: Qinisekisa ukuthi ugcwalisa zonke izinkambu ezidingekayo (Yebo/Cha, iphesenti, kanye nencazelo yombhalo).
Izinkinga zokulayisha ifayela: Amafayela kufanele abe ngaphansi kwe-1MB. Zama ukunciphisa usayizi wefayela noma usebenzise izinhlobo ezahlukene.
Awukwazi ukubona okuthunyelwe kwamanye amalungu eqembu: Abalawuli benhlangano kuphela abangabuka konke okuthunyelwe.
Izigaba zokuhlola ezingekho: Xhumana nomlawuli wakho ukuze uqinisekise ukunikezwa kwezigaba zenhlangano yakho.

beforeStarting.title: Ngaphambi Kokuqala:
items: • Bandakanya amalungu eqembu avela ezindaweni ezahlukene

needHelp.title: Udinga Usizo?
needHelp.description: Uma udinga usizo noma unemibuzo mayelana nokusebenzisa ipulatifomu:
needHelp.contactAdmin: 💬 Xhumana nomlawuli wenhlangano yakho mayelana nemibuzo ethize yendima

adminGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womlawuli WePulatifomu ye-DGRV
adminGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandlela ophelele wokuphatha ipulatifomu yokuhlola ukusimama ye-DGRV

overview.title: Isibukezo Sepulatifomu
content: Ipulatifomu Yokuhlola Ukusimama ye-DGRV yenzelwe ukusiza amafelandawonye kuyo yonke iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi alinganise futhi athuthukise izindlela zawo zokusimama.
Njengomlawuli, unokufinyelela kumathuluzi aphelele okuphatha izinhlangano, abasebenzisi, okuqukethwe kokuhlola, kanye nokubuyekeza okuthunyelwe.
Ipulatifomu isekela izilimi eziningi futhi isebenza ungaxhunyiwe ku-inthanethi ukuze ivumelane nezinselelo zokuxhumana ezihlukahlukene esifundeni.

organizations.title: Ukuphatha Izinhlangano
content: Faka izinhlangano zamafelandawonye ezintsha epulatifomini ngolwazi lwawo oluyisisekelo kanye nezilungiselelo zesizinda.
Lungisa izilungiselelo ezithize zenhlangano futhi uphathe ukufinyelela kwabasebenzisi kwefelandawonye ngalinye.
Qaphela umsebenzi wenhlangano futhi uqinisekise ukuhlukaniswa kwedatha okufanele phakathi kwamafelandawonye ahlukahlukene.
Gcina noma ususe izinhlangano ezingasasebenzi ngenkathi ulondoloza idatha yawo yomlando.

users.title: Ukuphatha Abasebenzisi
content: Dala futhi uphathe ama-akhawunti abasebenzisi kuzo zonke izinhlangano ngokunikezwa kwezindima ezifanele.
Nika abasebenzisi izinhlangano ezithile futhi ulungise izimvume zabo zokufinyelela.
Qaphela umsebenzi wabasebenzisi futhi uphathe isimo sokuqinisekisa ama-akhawunti.
Qinisekisa ukuphepha okufanele ngokubuyekeza njalo ukufinyelela kwabasebenzisi kanye nokususa ama-akhawunti angasebenzi.

categories.title: Ukuphatha Izigaba Zokuhlola
content: Lungisa izigaba zokuhlola ezihambisana nezindlela ezingcono zokusimama kanye nezidingo zasendaweni.
Setha izisindo ezifanele zesigaba ngasinye ukuze uqinisekise ukulinganiswa kokuhlola.
Hlela izigaba ngokulandelana kokuboniswa okunengqondo ukuze kube nokwazi okuhle kakhulu komsebenzisi.
Buyekeza futhi ubuyekeze izigaba njalo ngokusekelwe empendulweni kanye nezindinganiso zokusimama ezishintshayo.

questions.title: Ukuphatha Imibuzo Yokuhlola
content: Dala imibuzo ephelele ngaphakathi kwesigaba ngasinye ukuze uhlola ngokuphelele izindlela zokusimama.
Nikeza imibuzo ngezilimi eziningi ukuze usekele imiphakathi yamafelandawonye ehlukahlukene.
Setha izisindo ezifanele kanye nokulandelana kokuboniswa kwemibuzo ngaphakathi kwesigaba ngasinye.
Buyekeza futhi ubuyekeze imibuzo njalo ngokusekelwe emiphumeleni yokuhlola kanye nempendulo yabathintekayo.

reviews.title: Ukubuyekeza Ukuhlola
content: Buyekeza ukuhlola okuthunyelwe ngokuphelele, ucabangele kokubili amaphuzu aquantitative kanye nezimpendulo ze-qualitative.
Nikeza impendulo eyakhayo kanye nezincomo ezithile zokuthuthukisa.
Sebenzisa izincomo ezijwayelekile ukuze uqinisekise ukuvumelana kuzo zonke izibuyekezo eziningi.
Vuma, nqaba, noma cela ukubuyekezwa ngokusekelwe ekhwalithini nasekuqedeni kokuhlola.

recommendations.title: Izincomo Ezijwayelekile
content: Dala izifanekiso zezincomo ezingasetshenziswa kabusha kwezimo zokuhlola ezijwayelekile kanye nezindawo zokuthuthukisa.
Gcina umtapo wezincwadi wezincomo zekhwalithi ephezulu ezingasetshenziswa kumafelandawonye ahlukahlukene.
Buyekeza izincomo njalo ngokusekelwe ezindleleni ezingcono kanye namasu okuthuthukisa aphumelelayo.
Qinisekisa ukuthi izincomo ziyasebenza futhi ziyafezeka kumafelandawonye anosayizi abahlukahlukene kanye nezinsiza.

systemHealth.title: Impilo Yohlelo kanye Nokusebenza
content: Qaphela ukusebenza kwepulatifomu, impilo yesizindalwazi, kanye nezikhathi zempendulo ye-API njalo.
Buyekeza isimo somugqa wokuvumelanisa futhi uqinisekise ukuthi ukuvumelanisa idatha kusebenza kahle.
Thumela imibiko yohlelo kanye namalogi okucwaninga ngezinjongo zokuthobela kanye nokuxazulula izinkinga.
Gcina izipele ezijwayelekile futhi uqinisekise ukuphepha kwedatha kuzo zonke izingxenye zepulatifomu.

support.title: Ukusekela AmaFelandawonye
content: Nikeza umhlahlandlela kumafelandawonye mayelana nokusebenzisa ipulatifomu ngokuphumelelayo ngezinjongo zawo zokusimama.
Nikeza ukuqeqesha kanye nezinsiza zokusekela ukuze usize izinhlangano zikhulise inani lokuhlola kwazo.
Qaphela izitayela zokuhlola futhi ukhombe amathuba okuthuthukisa ipulatifomu.
Yakha ubudlelwano nabaholi bamafelandawonye ukuze uqonde izidingo kanye nezinselelo zabo ezikhethekile.

regularReviews.title: Ukubuyekezwa Okujwayelekile:
items: • Buyekeza ukuhlola okusalindile okungenani kanye ngesonto
• Qaphela impilo yohlelo kanye nemethrikhi yokusebenza

qualityAssurance.title: Ukuqinisekisa Ikhwalithi:
items: • Qinisekisa izindinganiso zokubuyekeza ezivumelanayo kuzo zonke izibuyekezo
• Gcina idatha yohlelo kanye nezilungiselelo njalo

contactInfo.title: Usizo Lokuphatha
contactInfo.description: Ngokwesekelo lobuchwepheshe noma imibuzo yokuphatha ipulatifomu:

reviewAssessments.reviewDescription: Buyekeza futhi unikeze izincomo zokuhlola lokusimama
reviewAssessments.question: umbuzo
reviewAssessments.reviewSavedLocally: Ukubuyekezwa kugcinwe endaweni. Kuzovumelanisa lapho kuxhunyiwe.
